rules.description: CAPS_LOCK to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or TAB (If Alone)
hyperSE (secondary hyper key) triggered on TAB and hold; alone => navigate to right open tab (Chrome/Finder/VSCode/Safari)
hyperSE + RIGHT_SHIFT == Navigate to Left Open Tab
LEFT_SHIFT + RIGHT_SHIFT to Chrome > Search open tabs
Hold down ESCAPE to see large Digi Clock
Finder > Use Hyper + ENTER/quote as Open/Back
Finder > Use Hyper + X for Cut and Paste
Finder > Hyper + G == Go to Folder
Chrome/Safari/Finder > Use Hyper + T to open new tab
Chrome/Safari > Use cmd + ` to reopen last closed browser tab
Preview > Hyper + A/T/G == Toggle Markup Toolbar/Text Box/Go to Page; âŒ˜ + M == Highlight
Powerpoint > Map the 'End' key to right_arrow key
Hyper + quote/ENTER == Place cursor at beginning/end of line (+fwd/bk in browser history)
Ctrl + H/L moves Forward/Backward by 1 word
(1/2) Do not auto close brackets & quotes when holding fn
(2/2) Auto close brackets & quotes ( (), '', "", ``, [], {}, â€œâ€, â€˜â€™, <> )
